missing.description: Missing meta description which is crucial for search engines to understand page content
Missing keywords meta tag (less important for modern SEO but still useful)
Missing robots meta tag to control search engine crawling behavior
Missing canonical URL tag to prevent duplicate content issues

meta_tags.weight_impact: Minimal - current meta tags add approximately 0.2KB to HTML

missing.description: Missing Open Graph title for social media sharing
Missing Open Graph description for social media sharing
Missing Open Graph image for social media sharing
Missing Open Graph URL for social media sharing

robots_txt.recommendation: Create a robots.txt file to guide search engine crawlers

sitemap_xml.recommendation: Create a sitemap.xml file to help search engines discover and index all pages

page_weight.recommendation: Current meta tag weight is minimal, but adding proper SEO tags would increase it to approximately 1-2KB, which is still well within acceptable limits

recommendations: Add essential meta tags including description, robots, and canonical URL
Implement Open Graph tags for better social media sharing
Add structured data using JSON-LD for better search engine understanding
Ensure all images used for Open Graph have appropriate dimensions and file sizes
